copyTranscript.description: Text shown in the extension button

extensionDescription.message: Sao chép bản ghi video YouTube chỉ bằng một cú nhấp chuột.

noVideoId.description: Error message when no video ID is found

transcriptCopied.description: Success message when transcript is copied

transcriptError.description: Error message when transcript cannot be fetched

untitled.description: Default title when video title cannot be found
